text: I Cried may refer to: *"I Cried", popular song written by Michael Elias and Billy Duke *"I Cried" (James Brown song), song recorded by Tammy Montgomery (Tammi Terrell) and James Brown ==See also== *"I Cried for You", pop and jazz standard with music written by Arthur Freed and Abe Lyman, with lyrics by Gus Arnheim *"I Cried for You" (Katie Melua song), single by Katie Melua from her album Piece by Piece *I Cry (disambiguation) *Cry (disambiguation)
title: I Cried (disambiguation)
